1.content: What kind of world do you want?
1.title: First choice

choices: "I said no way you... evil witch!"
1111.content:
Kagome was walking in a long dark corridor. She and the others found a mysterious European style castle in the forest, and decided to have a look inside. Unfortunately at some point she separated from the group, and now she was alone, looking for a way out.
"For a second I was sure that I sensed a shard of Shikon jewel here, but now I can't sense it anymore..." she sighed. She was walking around the castle for two hours and still couldn't find the exit. The castle looked abandoned, most of the stuff was covered in spiderwebs and dust. Kagome opened door to one of the rooms. It was a empty dining room but surprisingly it didn't looked as bad as the rest of the castle, there was significantly less dust, also some of the chairs and the table looked new.
"Does someone live here after all?" said Kagome. After she said that she heard someones voice behind her.
"Well, well, who are you girl? And what are you doing in my castle?"
Kagome quickly turned around and saw a young woman with long black hair, who was dressed like a witch. "I'm Kagome Higurashi, I got lost here when me and my friends decided to look whats inside this castle."
"I'm Lilith, the witch, and this is my castle."she said
When Kagome heard 'the witch' part she took a step back and reached for her bow.
"Calm down girl, I don't eat people or anything. Besides, do you really think you alone stand any chance against me?" said the witch
"I'm sorry, It's just kind of weird that suddenly there's an european castle in middle of feudal Japan with a witch in it. I thought it was some kind of evil plan by Naraku."
"I don't know anyone with that name. You and your friends are the first people to enter this place and look around so much."
"You've seen my friends? Can you get me to them?" said Kagome hoping that she will finally leave this castle.
"Don't worry they are waiting for you at the entrance. But didn't you mumbled something about some jewel before?" Said Lilith
"Yeah, we want to find it's shards before Naraku does."
"Well, I've found some kind of jewel shard today and put it in my room."
"Then why can't I sense it, as I normally can?"asked Kagome with a bit of suspicion in her voice
"My room has a magical barrier around it, so that no magical energy from the objects i keep here gets out. If you want we can go there and I will show you that shard." Said the witch
Kagome though for a moment that it can be a trap, but on the other hand she really felt the shard somewhere close.
"Okay, let's go." She said
Lilith opened a teleport that led them straight to a luxurious room with a royal style bed, few full bookshelves, sofa, two chairs and other stuff.
"Wow, it's different from the rest of the castle." said surprised Kagome
Lilith then taken the shard from her desk and showed it to Kagome, but when Kagome tried to take it, the witch quickly took it away from her.
"Did I said I will give it to you for free?" said Lilith with an evil smile
"But, what do you want? We don't have much money." said Kagome
"I don't need money, but If you let me have some 'fun' with you, the shard will be yours." The witch said while looking at Kagome from her feet to the head.
"No way!" said Kagome while backing off from the witch
"Don't worry, I told you it will not hurt. Also if you don't accept, I think this Naraku you mentioned might be interested in this thing too. Am I right?" Said Lilith
"Uh..." Kagome hesitated
1111.title: Kagome lost in the castle

115311.content:
Lilith was in her room, drinking tea and sitting on the sofa.
"Maybe, I teleported my castle a bit too far from the city."thought the witch
"It's been two weeks and nothing happened: no one entered the castle, no one needed help nearby. This is really boring for a world where,as my informant told me demons, angels and fallen angels exist."Thought Lilith and sighed.
"I guess I'll have to go look for some fun myself. But first I will ask that guy if he seen any pretty girls in here." thought the witch and she contacted her informant telepathically to come see her. Half an hour later a someone teleported to her room. He looked around 20. He had short light-brown hair and a stubble. He was dressed in a mage's outfit.
"Hi, Lilith! What do you need?" He said
"Alastor, Have you seen any pretty girls in this world?"Asked Lilith
"Well, a lot of them. This world has really awesome girls."Said Alastor
"Someone in particular?"asked the witch
"Hmm... There's a heir to one of the Demon families: Rias Gremory. She's really hot, that long red hair and great body... If I only found a way to make her mine..." Said the mage
"Show me her photos and give me her address."Said Lilith
"Photos? Who do you think I am? I respect other people's privacy..."Said Alastor in a bit nervous tone. Lilith just gave him a doubting look.
"Alright, I guess there's no reason to lie to you. You prefer naked photos, dressed ones or lingerie ones?" Said the mage
"Just give me one of each." Said Lilith
"Here you go." He said as he handed Lilith three photos. Lilith watched three photos and smiled.
"Yes, she is perfect. Give me her address" Said Lilith
"Okay, but it will cost you" Said Alastor
"Well, what do you want?"Asked Lilith
"Kiss me."Said the mage
"No way. I'm only interested in girls." Said Lilith
"Then at least, show me your boobs." Said Alastor
"Just give me the address and, I will still tolerate your company"Said the witch
"That's kind of harsh thing to say to a friend."Said Alastor
"I never said you are one."Said Lilith
"Ouch... You are heartless. I am the only person that visits you, helps you and you say I'm not a friend?" Said Alastor
"Nope, more like a useful, but annoying minion." Said Lilith
"One day you will be mine anyway."mumbled Alastor and wrote the address on a piece of paper.
Then he said goodbye and teleported. Lilith taken the piece of paper.
"Funny guy."She said and started thinking about how to get to Rias.
115311.title: A bored witch and her informant.

115321.content: Where will the two meet?
115321.title: Medaka Kurokami

1153211.content:
It was Friday afternoon at Hakoniwa Academy and another school week had come to an end. Medaka walked over to the student council's office to open the suggestions box and look over that week's suggestions before heading home. She was wearing her sleeveless school uniform, as she does during the summer months. Everyone else had already gone home for the day, so she would be by herself in the office. Or so she thought. When she unlocked the door and walked into the room, to her surprise, a young looking woman with long black hair and a witch's uniform was sitting in one of the chairs.

"Hang on a second. Who are you?", Medaka asked.

"I am Lillith the witch", the woman answered, "And you are, Medaka Kurokami, is that correct?"

"Yes, that's correct", Medaka answered.

"Such a nice name", Lillith commented.

"I think I've heard about you from somewhere. By the way, how did you get in if the door was locked?", Medaka wondered.

"Being a witch, I have the power to teleport myself anywhere in an instant", Lillith explained.

"Anyway, why are you here?", Medaka asked.

"I have an offer for you", Lillith told her.

"What kind of offer?", Medaka questioned.

"Just sit down on the couch over there, and I'll explain", Lillith replied.

"Well...all right. If you insist", Medaka answered, slightly uneasily, as she sat down on the couch, "So what kind of offer do you mean?"

"To help you to relax", Lillith explained as she stared at Medaka's long legs, "I know how hard you work for your school council".

"I do work hard for my fellow students", Medaka told her.

"I bet you're on your feet all day running around", Lillith continued, "I'm sure they must be tired".

"Yeah...I guess so", Medaka admitted, "But...just what are you getting at?"

"Well, my dear", Lillith answered, laughing to herself a bit as she took hold of Medaka's left foot.

"Wait a second, what are you doing?", Medaka demanded, surprised at this.

"This will help you to relax", Lillith told her, "But first I need to take off your shoes"

"Are you sure?", Medaka wondered, "My feet are probably really sweaty and smelly right now"

"Don't worry, young Medaka", Lillith reassured her, "I do this all the time. Now you just sit back while I help you".

"Um...okay...I guess, you know what you're doing", Medaka answered shyly.

With that, Lillith took off Medaka's size 7 shoes, and a rather strong vinegary odor emerged, proving that Medaka really had been running around all day in those shoes. Then she took hold of Medaka's stockinged feet and started to massage them.

"Ooooh...wow", Medaka moaned, "I've never really...had anyone...massage my feet...before"

"Do you like this feeling?", Lillith asked.

"Mmmm, yes I do, actually", Medaka sighed, "Just what I...need after a...long day of work"

"Very good", Lillith replied, "Are you starting to feel relaxed now?"

"Oooh yes", Medaka mumbled, letting her arms fall loosely to her sides, "This feels...so good. So...relaxing."

Lillith continued massaging for a few minutes, then she spoke up again.

"By the way, Medaka", she asked, "Do you mind if I take your stockings off?"

Medaka awoke from her daze and replied, "Huh? Oh...sure. If you want to".

With that, Lillith slowly pulled off Medaka's thigh high stockings moving them down her long sexy legs. When the stockings were off, Lillith noticed that Medaka's toenails were painted a sexy shade of purple.

"Such perfect little feet", she thought to herself.

She then pulled out a bottle of lotion and began to rub some of it into Medaka's soles and toes.

"So how does this feel now?", Lillith asked.

"Soooo.....good", Medaka moaned, "Soooo....relaaaxxxing"

As she started sliding her fingers between the toes, Lillith noticed that Medaka's eyes were starting to become heavy and flutter.

"How do you feel now, Medaka", she asked.

"Actually....I feel....kind of....sleepy", Medaka sighed, yawning as she said this.

"That's fine", Lillith told her as she kept massaging, "Why don't you just close your eyes, Medaka, and I'll do the hard work for now".

"O-Okay.....I.....guess.....it.....won't hurt.....if I.....just.....close my.....eyes.....for a.....few.....minutes.....", Medaka whispered sleepily, as she closed her eyes and yawned.

"That's right", Lillith encouraged, "Just rest your heavy drowsy eyes and clear your mind of all outside thoughts. Just let yourself go".

Medaka nodded her eyes while keeping her eyes closed.

"Yes.....clear my.....mind", she mumbled drowsily, "Let.....myself.....go".

Lillith then started slowly rotating Medaka's ankles to get some more of the stress out, causing Medaka to moan in pleasure.

Then she started rubbing more of the lotion into Medaka's perfect feet, moving up from her heels, to her arches, and the balls of her feet and then massaging each toe one by one. This process caused even more relaxed sighs and yawns from Medaka.

"She has such a peaceful looking face when her eyes are closed", Lillith thought to herself, "I wonder if she's still awake or if she's asleep"

She thought to herself wondering what she should do with Medaka next.

13.title: Create your own

choices: Makayla is sent to an all-girl’s boarding school
Makayla is walking over to a neighbor’s house
131.content:
Makayla is a lovely mixed-race girl of 12. She lives with her white natural mother, Noreen, and her white stepfather, Graham, (and Graham’s daughter from a previous marriage every other weekend) in a large house on an old suburban street.

She loves her mother, but has never grown close to Graham, whom she distrusts, though he’s rarely done anything outright suspicious around her (until lately, maybe?). Makalya never got to really know her real father, who left her mother when she was a toddler. This may have led to some issues of mistrust towards men for our cocoa-skinned beauty.
131.title: Makayla & the Evil Witch

choices: Is offered a ride by someone she knows
Thinks she hears someone calling her name
Tries to get a kitten down from a tree
1313.content:
It’s early on a summer weekend day when pretty little Makayla heads off on foot to a friend’s house several blocks away. Her Mom is working, and Graham enjoying a late morning before he goes off to do something (Makayla doesn’t really care). She’s glad that she’ll have the house to herself later, if she can’t find something else to do; but she’d really rather not waste the day sitting around the house alone.

Not knowing many other kids in the neighborhood, Makayla tries calling Wally, the boy her age down the street who is quite possibly gay and (does or) doesn’t know it, yet. Makayla likes Wally in that he was nice to her when she first moved in to the new neighborhood. He doesn’t look at her all funny like some older boys and men do, which makes her feel comfortable around him.

Not able to reach Wally, she decides to just walk over to his house several blocks away rather than be at the house alone with her step dad Graham.

On the way over to Wally’s Makayla -
1313.title: Makayla is walking over to a neighbor’s h...

choices: The old abandoned house (or IS it?)
13132.content:
Even immediately leaving the house, the day felt slightly “different” in some odd, intangible way to Makayla. Almost as if the light and colors had a curious sepia tone to them. Chocking it up to all the weird weather they’d had all summer, the budding young beauty heads towards her friend Wally’s house several blocks away, despite the foreboding look of a thunder cloud looming nearby, darkening the skies to the southeast.

Makayla is now four blocks away from her house, trying her phone again as she walks along the sidewalk. The cloud seems to fill the sky behind her as she hurries along as best she can. She almost never takes this small side-street. Actually, the only time she’s ever walked it was with Wally. Usually, she avoids it, even though it means a slightly longer walk. The whole street seems longer and twistier today, almost as if she has gotten lost, even as she still recognizes some features of the street, and it begins to get blustery, with splashy rain patches, and rumbles of thunder.

Makayla is making her way along perilously, the street and sidewalk both seemingly covered in a strange slimy/oily sort of sheen making her footing surprisingly treacherous. Believing herself only two more blocks from her friend, Makayla suddenly hears someone distinctly calling out her name!

Is it coming from:
13132.title: Thinks she hears someone calling her name

131321.content:
As Makayla makes her way over the gnarled root of a giant oak in the middle of the sidewalk, she is startled to hear the desperate voice of an old woman calling out her name, seeming to come from an old overgrown property with an abandoned house.

At least, she always thought the place was abandoned. Today, with the storm looming and lightening suddenly striking nearby, the place seems a lot better tended to than she remembered ever seeing it. Inviting almost...

“Makayla! Please, come closer girl, and help an old woman whose cat has gotten stuck on the roof! Oh, and this terrible storm approaching!”, cries the withered crone she can’t quite see, thanks to the thick trees and bushes directly behind the tall walls of the residence.

Makayla enters through the open gate and up the short shaded walkway past strange statues and topiary creatures to the front of the warmly lit house.

“Makayla! Please. I beg you, child! Help me get my dear Alastor-kitty down from the roof before this storm comes through any worse. Help an old woman with her precious pet, won’t you?”

Makayla feels slightly put upon, as she doesn’t even recall meeting this old woman prior to now, and the rains about to drench her if she stays outside much longer.

Then, she hears the poor wail of the small cat stranded up on the tall roof just above the 2nd floor window the old lady appears in. “I’m coming!”, she yells out to the old woman.

With the low-hanging branches of the thick fur trees surrounding the house seeming to close in behind her, Makayla yells, “Okay! Stay right there, m’am! I’ll meet you upstairs and we’ll figure out how to get your cat down from the roof. Sound good?”.

“Did you say 'settle my score for good'? Why, you little whippersnapper! I’ll have you know-“, yells down the old woman from high up on a balcony of the house Makayla had always thought was abandoned, as she begins a verbal tirade aimed at the baffled babe standing below, on the front steps of the place.
131321.title: The old abandoned house (or IS it?)

choices: Look for some info about Lilith's whereabouts
Look for Lilith's informer Alastor and make him talk.
Try to draw Lilith's attention somehow to draw her out.
132.content:
Scarlet is a 17 years old Witch Hunter
Witch Hunters are an organisation that hunts and captures witches, mages and other magic users who they consider dangerous.
They can use a special kind of magic that let's them weaken or block their target's magic. They're also skilled warriors.
. She has long blonde hair and is really attractive,normally she wears a special Witch Hunters armor that increases her resistance for all kinds of magic(She looks like Ferris from "Densetsu no Yuusha no Densetsu": http://gelbooru.com/index.php?page=post&... but with a dark blue colored armor). Scarlet fights using a single handed sword and special kind of magic developed by the Witch Hunters.
When she was 10, a mage that lived in her village was conducting some kind of experiment, that have gone wrong. A huge evil demon suddenly appeared, killed that mage and burnt the village to the ground. Then a group of Witch Hunters appeared and managed to kill the monster. After the fight they found Scarlet lying unconscious in what was left from her house. Her parents were nowhere to be found. They took her to their headquarters, and when she woke up they told her the story. Since then Scarlet despises, all kinds of magic users and thinks they all should be locked in prison cells forever. Witch Hunters headquarters became her home for the next five years.
When she was 15 she finished her training and started hunting witches and mages in many different worlds. She quickly gained reputation among Witch Hunters by capturing a lot of dangerous witches and mages. Lately she heard about Lilith and decided to hunt for her next.
How should she start?
132.title: Scarlet the Witch Hunter

choices: Scarlet and Sara continue sitting at the table
Scarlet wants to take a bath
1321.content:
Scarlet decided to ask some other Witch Hunters If they know Lilith's location. But they didn't know that, and warned her that many Hunters tried to capture Lilith, but they always came back with nothing. Without any useful clues Scarlet decided to ask her friend and informer Sara. She is a 20 years old dark elf assassin, and has long red hair usually tied in a ponytail. Her dark tanned skin,red hair and voluptuous body makes her very attractive, that helps her in doing her job and collecting information. Sara lives in her house hidden in the forest, quite far away, when traveling on foot it was at least few hours. Scarlet traveled and after three hours, she reached Sara's house. She knocked at the door. Sara opened it and almost immediately she hugged Scarlet friendly.
"Hey Scarlet! Long time no see."She said and stopped hugging her
"Uh... Hi, Sara."Said Scarlet still a bit surprised by the sudden hug
"Come in. I will prepare something for us."Said Sara
Scarlet sat down on a chair, to let her body rest a bit from the long walk. After a while Sara came with tea and some snacks.
"Thanks, Sara.I came here because I want to ask you about a certain witch." Said Scarlet
"Always going straight to the business. Can't we just talk like friends for a while?" Said Sara
"There's nothing to talk about, I think."Said Scarlet
"Come on, I haven't seen you since two months ago, when I helped you capture that mage. Something must have happened." Said Sara
"Just regular stuff. I caught two witches, rest a bit and now I'm looking for another one."Said Scarlet
"Are you working all the time? Don't you have anything better to do than hunting witches?"Said Sara
"Not really, I work hard to make the world a better place."Said Scarlet proudly
"Don't you just have fun sometimes?"Asked Sara
"Well, I like training with my sword, in my free time."Said Scarlet
"Are you serious?! That's all you do?" Said Sara
"Yes. But I have to move on, so tell me what do you know about a witch called Lilith and her current whereabouts?" Said Scarlet
"Lilith... As far as I know, she doesn't kill or hurt anyone, so I don't know why would Witch Hunters be after her."Said Sara
"We know she is powerful enough to teleport her whole castle between the worlds and she can control people. That means she is potentially a future threat, and should be imprisoned. But do you know where she is now?"Said Scarlet
"Yeah, I heard an old european style castle appeared in one of the worlds yesterday. I can give you info needed to establish a portal to this world. But, aren't you tired from all that walking you had to do to get here?" Said Sara
"Just a little, It's not a problem."Said Scarlet and was ready to get up
"Lilith is, as you said a powerful witch, you should rest here before going to hunt for her. I have a free room, so it's not a problem."Said Sara
"If you say so..."Said Scarlet a bit reluctant to the idea, but Sara had a point. If she wants to capture Lilith, she needs to be at her best.
"That's great. I hardly ever get any guests here so it's nice that you will stay."Said Sara
1321.title: Look for some info about Lilith's whereabouts

13211.content:
"Why don't you take off this heavy boots of yours? Your feet and legs must be sore."Said Sara
"I don't need to,besides today was hot so they probably smell bad."Said Scarlet
"Don't be shy! It's no problem. I'll help you."Said Sara, quickly jumped under the table and grabbed one of Scarlet's boots.
"Wha-What are you doing, Sara?!"Said surprised Scarlet, but Sara ignored her and removed one of witch hunter's boots, revealing her cute, smooth size 7 foot.
"Scarlet, your feet are so cute, you should show them more often."Said Sara admiring Scarlet's foot.
"Sara, you are acting strange..."Said Scarlet, but the elf just grabbed her other boot and taken it off.
"They're a bit sweaty but it's not a problem. I will give you foot massage now." Said Sara taking Scarlet's right foot and starting the massage.
"It feels good Sara... But why are you doing this?"Said still surprised Scarlet
"Remember how, when we first met your leg was hurt, and I had to take your boot off, to take care of the wound? When I saw your cute bare foot, I realized that I have a fetish for your feet. I tried to hold back then, but now, when we know each other better, I can't hold back anymore." Said Sara sensually rubbing Scarlet's foot. At first she massaged her sole, then she slowly moved up to the toes, feeling Sara's fingers under her toes Scarlet wiggled them a bit and moaned.
"You like it under your toes? Okay, I will concentrate on that." Said Sara and continued rubbing under Scarlet's toes. After 5 minutes of that she switched to Scarlet's left foot and done the same thing. The Witch Hunter moaned in pleasure as elf's fingers were pressing under her toes.
When Sara finished the massage she brought Scarlet's foot closer to her face and started sniffing it.
"Scarlet, your feet smell wonderful."She said and continued to sniff Scarlet's foot, after a while she grabbed the other foot and started sniffing both of them at the same time. After 10 minutes of that, Sara let go of Scarlet's left foot, and lightly kissed her big toe on the other one and started kissing the remaining four.
"Have you just... kissed my foot?"Said Scarlet surprised and embarrassed
"Yeah, I'm going to give your cute feet all love they deserve now."Said Sara and kissed Scarlet's heel.
"What do you mean by...oh!"Scarlet couldn't finish sentence because then, the elf stuck out her tongue and licked Scarlet's foot from the heel to the toes. All that foot pampering was new to the Witch Hunter, but it felt really good to her. Sara then taken two of Scarlet's toes into her mouth, wrapped her tongue around them and started sucking. Scarlet's moans got louder and she started wiggling her toes, encouraging Sara to suck harder. After Witch Hunter's right foot was all wet with saliva Sara, switched to the left one. First she kissed Scarlet's foot all over and then started licking her sole. After licking the sole she started put her tongue between Scarlet's wiggling toes. Scarlet felt great when Sara started sucking her toes again. After 20 more minutes of foot worship, Sara stopped and got out from under the table.
"How was it, Scarlet?"Asked the elf
"I've... never felt anything like that before... It was really good." Said Scarlet
"I was trying hard to make you feel good. I guess I'll get your bed ready now." Said Sara and left to the guest's room.
13211.title: Sara's secret fetish

choices: Find some people and ask if they know anything
132111.content:
Next day around noon Scarlet was about to leave, but Sara stopped her and handed her a note.
"There's info you need to establish a portal to this world. You didn't wanted to leave without it?"Said the dark elf
"Oh, that's right. Thanks Sara, and goodbye." Said Scarlet. In reality she wanted to leave quickly, because she couldn't stop thinking about what happened yesterday at the table.
"No problem. See you, and good luck with your hunt!" Said Sara
Witch hunters can't just teleport to other worlds like mages and witches do. Scarlet needed to prepare a portal for herself. To do that she needed special magical words given to her by Sara. Scarlet was looking for a place to use them. At the same time she was thinking about how good it felt, when Sara was licking her feet. She remembered the feeling of wet tongue between her toes, and sensation of having her toes sucked. Then she finally found a nice place in the forest. She shook her head, and started to concentrate on establishing portal. She started reading the words on the note, then a blue glowing entrance appeared before her. Scarlet entered it, and after a while she was in a different forest...
What should Scarlet do now?
132111.title: Next Day

133.content:
Kit was once poised to rule the world she came from (her brother was going to give it to her) only to be set back by several betrayals. All quite deserved; although a very capable worrier kit still seemed to belive it was best to sleep your to top, it was fun as well as rewarding. But when she ordered one of her goons to rape and kill this one elvan woman (she had apparently "seduced" kit's "true" love) she cought Lillith's attention. Not because she felt bad for the elf, but because she had just given up the opportunity for some swains lesbian sex, which her story desperately needed.

But fist Lillith needs to save her. She is kinda on the brink of death in the keeping of a deathknight (who also loves her) and the world's evil goddess of dragons wants her soul.
133.title: Kitiara Uth-Matar

info.brief_description: Lilith is a lesbian witch with a tickling and foot fetishes. Who will be her next victim?
info.description:
Originally created by darkblade7557

Rules:
1.No character killing, vore, weight gain or scat.
2.Only lesbian stuff when it comes to foot worship and sex.(Men can tickle the girls, but nothing more than that)
3.Sex is allowed but focus on foot fetish and tickling first.
4.Write in 3rd person perspective (e.g Lilith tickled Kagome's feet)
5.Shrinking Lilith or other females is fine(But NO male giants, only giantesses).

Main character:

Lilith- A witch that lives in her own castle. She is more than 200 years old, but thanks to elixir of immortality she drank she doesn't get older and can't die. She looks around 20 and is very attractive. She has long black hair and wears a witch's hat and clothes (http://gelbooru.com/index.php?page=post&s=view&id=164460). She is a lesbian with tickling and foot fetishes. Lilith hardly ever calls people by their names.
Lilith is also very skilled with many kinds of magic, she is even able to teleport her castle to different worlds or control people.

Minor character:
Alastor- A mage that gives Lilith information about worlds and if necessary, pretty girls living in them. He is around 30 years old, has light-brown hair and has a stubble.

Have fun
